attributes.action: Ban the import of all Chinese goods until the repression of the citizens of Tibet is ended.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chinese government is using the Olympic Games to repress both the citizens of Tibet and their own citizens. They feel that at this late stage, the countries of the world will not pull out of the Olympics and they are showing their total contempt for the opinion of all civilised nations. The ban on all Tibetan flags during the games in Beijing, is the last straw. China must be shown that this type of repression will not be condoned.
